short_summary: Amendment to Response Deadline Closing Time: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posted response deadline closing time.
description: National Master Standing Offers for bulk aviation fuels in accordance with Canadian General Standards Board standards, as applicable. Delivery to various locations in Canada on an as-and-when-requested basis from April 1, 2023 up to and including March 31, 2025.
full_summary:
### Request for Standing Offer - Bulk Aviation Fuel

#### Solicitation Information

| **Description** | **Value** |
| --- | --- |
| **Reference Number** | WS3761283182 |
| **Solicitation Number** | WS3761283182 |
| **Publication Date** | 2023-09-28 |
| **Tender Closing Date and Time** | 2023-10-24T14:00:00 |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | None |
| **Expected Contract End Date** | 2025-03-31 |

#### Requirement Details

* **Type**: Request for Standing Offer
* **Description**: National Master Standing Offers for bulk aviation fuels
* **Standards**: Compliant with Canadian General Standards Board standards, as applicable
* **Delivery Locations**: Various locations across Canada
* **Delivery Period**: April 1, 2023 to March 31, 2025

#### Evaluation Criteria

* Proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price

#### Tender Details

* **Currency**: None specified
* **Deposit**: None
* **Payment Terms**: None specified

#### Award Criteria

* **Trade Agreements**: Compliant with various free trade agreements, including:
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

#### Contact Information

* **Name**: Munz, Pam (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: pam.munz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: None
* **Fax**: None
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5

#### Further Information

* For more information, please visit the Ariba Discovery website: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/175
